collapsiblesidebar-hide-link: The link to collapse sidebar (hide sidebars).
collapsiblesidebar-hide-link-tooltip: Tooltip for the link to collapse sidebar (hide sidebars).
collapsiblesidebar-show-link: The link to expand sidebar (show sidebars).
collapsiblesidebar-show-link-tooltip: Tooltip for the link to expand sidebar (show sidebars).
